title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: First Layer 1 PoW Blockchain to have Liquidity Mining and Staking, A Greater Alternative to PoW Ethereum.https://pinkchain.net/https://pinkchain.net/#mining-poolshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/pinkchainAlgorithm - EthashNetwork Name : PinkChainNew RPC URL: https://rpc.pinkscan.org/Chain ID: 10100Currency Symbol: PINKPOM Explorer: https://pinkscan.org/https://t.me/Info4atlanin/8303Chain ID   10100 (mainnet), 10101 (testnet)Ticker   PINKMax Supply   100,000,000 PINKPremine   20,000,000 PINK (20%) [Premine includes farming & staking rewards]Block Time   ~10 secondsPoW Block Reward   1.00 PINK / BlockFarming + Staking Reward   0.10 PINK / BlockSupported Cross-chains Networks   BSChttps://pinkchain.net/#tokenomics

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: what do you say is it worth trying to undermine it? i am mining Flux and ETHW now ..

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Another one of the many chains that are not really trying to be original, or at least having that one feature that is unique from the rest. Not trying to discredit the work the creators are trying to do, but it just feels like one of those projects that will first get some hype and then slowly go behind the shadows as months pass by because people already have alternatives they are used to.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on October 27, 2022, 01:30:17 PMwhat do you say is it worth trying to undermine it? i am mining Flux and ETHW now ..You yourself must make this decision. If you mine ETHW, then you probably have very cheap electricity, because at my rate of 5 cents per kilowatt, there is no profit on many old video cards, and on new ones only a few cents per day. Ethereum clones may still appear, but most of them will close.

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: in fact, I believe that soon I will turn off everything so as to preserve the gpu ...

comments.author: badbart
comments.body: Take your electrical cost and use it to buy coins, GPU mining isn't worth it right now.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: What are their plans for their premined 20,000,000 PINK?  Seemed a lot for developers alone. Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 27, 2022, 11:57:48 PMAnother one of the many chains that are not really trying to be original, or at least having that one feature that is unique from the rest. Not trying to discredit the work the creators are trying to do, but it just feels like one of those projects that will first get some hype and then slowly go behind the shadows as months pass by because people already have alternatives they are used to.Well they didn't claimed to be a killer of another leyer1 that's original somehow and the name itself sounds like they are intended for particular group of people. Its a bit crowded already for altcoins that they already have same tickers, PINK is already taken making this unoriginal.

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: Quote from: badbart on October 28, 2022, 03:56:54 PMTake your electrical cost and use it to buy coins, GPU mining isn't worth it right now. the electricity cost is not a problem ..

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: I read about this project some weeks ago but I decided not to mine the coin because it's in form of a token, I expected this to be a standalone coin just like the rest of PoW algorithm coins, it shows how unserious the people behind this project are.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Last update from the official site https://pinkchain.net/  :Pinkchain is closed and the old team is no more. But since it's decentralized blockchain, anyone can takeover and lead Pinkchain. We hope all the best to the new team who will takeover Pinkchain.One Ethereum fork scammed! The project worked for 1 month.
